AGd.caption: Table name
AGd.doc: Unique table name so you can add columns to it and end it.
AGd.name: table_name

AGf.caption: Repeating structure name
AGf.doc: The repeating structure this table is being repeated into.
AGf.name: repeating_structure_name

AGi.caption: Place headers
AGi.doc: If "yes", will create a header row. Good for column titles.
AGi.name: place_headers

AGk.caption: Header style
AGk.doc: The name of the text style you want to be applied to the header's text.
AGk.name: header_style
